eu.eexcess.insa

Class QueryEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.eexcess.insa.QueryEngine

  • public class QueryEngine
extends Object
    Two formats of queries are handled in this component:
    • QF1: allows to represent queries of the form q = (t1 t2). This format is the only one handled by the federated recommender.
    • QF2: allows to represent composed queries of the form q = [(t1 t2), (t3 t4), (t5 t6)].
    Two formats of results are handled in this component:
    • RF1: represents a result of the form r = [r1, r2, r3]. This format is the one returned by the federated recommender.
    • RF2: represents a result of the form r = [[r1, r2, r3], [r4, r5, r6], [r7, r8, r9]].
    Queries of format QF1 executed with processQuery (respectively QF2 executed with processDisjunctiveQuery) will return a result of format RF1 (respectively RF2).
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Thomas Cerqueus

    • Method Detail

      • alterQuery

        public org.json.JSONObject alterQuery(String origin,
                             org.json.JSONObject query)
        Alters the query to generate a query identifier (if needed), to remove the user identifier, and to remove the origin.
        Parameters:
        origin - Origin of the query.
        query - Query of format QF1 or QF2.
        Returns:
        A query (QF1 or QF2).

      • isDisjunctiveQuery

        public Boolean isDisjunctiveQuery(org.json.JSONObject query)
        Determines if the query is disjunctive (format QF1) or not (QF2).
        Parameters:
        query - A query.
        Returns:
        true if the format of query is QF1; false otherwise.

      • processQuery

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response processQuery(String origin,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                     org.json.JSONObject query)
        Process a query of format QF1. The query is sent to the federated recommender.
        Parameters:
        origin - Origin of the query.
        req - HTTP request.
        query - Query of format QF1.
        Returns:
        Result containing a set of recommendations. The format is RF1.

      • processDisjunctiveQuery

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response processDisjunctiveQuery(String origin,
                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                                org.json.JSONObject query)
        Process a query of format QF2. The query is split into multiple queries (of format QF1) that are sent to the federated recommender.
        Parameters:
        origin - Origin of the query.
        req - HTTP request.
        query - Disjunctive query (i.e., query of format QF2).
        Returns:
        Result containing an list of set of recommendations. The format is RF2.
